title: NEW Baroudeur Rhino 500W e-bikes | Proudly South African
text: BAROUDEUR Bicycles is a South African-based company that started in 2019 and was born from an absolute passion for all things family, outdoor, cycling and endorphin inducing.The Baroudeur Team has a passion for producing bikes that can navigate the rugged African terrain while honouring a pocket friendly approach to maintenance, as well providing a sustainable, carbon-neutral, enjoyable and comfortable riding experience.Motor: 48V 500W or 750W(only available end November)Battery: 48V 16AH Lithium Ion (charge time 4 hours)Controller: Pedal assist and thumb throttleLCD Display: 5 speed levels, battery level, speed, rangeMax speed: 35km/hRange per charge: 65km +Loading capacity: 130kgBike weight: 28kgFrame: Aluminium AlloyTyres: Chao Yung Big Daddy dual compound 26" x 4"Derailleur: 7 speed Shimano AceraBrakes: Tektra Hydraulic Discs• 3 months warranty on moving parts• 1 year warranty on electronic equipment• Lifetime warranty on frame for first owner500W: R32,500.00  |  750W: R36,000.00 (available end November)Please contact me (Sean) for a full list of specifications or if you would like more info or a demo ride on a 500W. Video: https://www.facebook.com/baroudeur.bicycles/videos

title: Cycle Science Westville- Bicycle service and repair shop
text:
Cycle Science Westville 
Bicycle Service & Repairs 
1 Link road,  Westville, Durban 

Our workshop situated at the Westville Country Club at the Eco trails opposite Cadence. No 1 Link Road, Westville.

We offer the following services at competitive rates: 

Major Service 
Minor Service 

FREE Bike collection and delivery anywhere in Durban and surrounds 

Additional Services:
• Suspension Service - Quotation depending on work needed
• Wheel Hub Service 
• Wheel truing 
• Gear/Derailleur Calibration 
• All repairs and general maintenance
• Wash and Lube 
• Custom Bike builds
• Full Bicycle restorations
• Replacement parts fitted 

Minor Service:
• Wash n Lube
• Overall diagnostic check
• Front and rear Gears reset
• True Rims
• Check all pivots and moving parts 

Major service - includes Minor service plus:
• Full frame strip down and clean
• Chain & cassette removed & cleaned
• Bottom bracket & headset service
• Derailleurs cleaned & lubed
• Pivot bearings & bushings serviced
• Replace gear cables. 

Contact
Jason at Cycle Science
0815310901
1 Link road, Westville.
cyclesciencekzn@gmail.com
https://cyclescience.business.site/
https://fb.me/cyclesciencekzn

title: 2021 GIANT TALON E+29ER 1 TRAIL BIKE
text: The trail is calling, and here’s how to answer. This balanced, smooth-riding E-bike gives you a natural-feeling boost of power and total control, so you can have more fun and expand your off-road riding capabilities.With a lightweight aluminum frame that blends classic hardtail design with modern E-bike technology, Talon E+ 29 delivers comfort and confidence on off-road terrain. Perfect for bike paths or XC trails, it features a SyncDrive Core motor system that makes those hard climbs easier and encourages you to extend your ride time. It’s designed for a 100mm suspension fork to smooth out the bumps, and its 29-inch wheels give it a stable, balanced ride quality. The side-release EnergyPak battery is integrated into the frame and can be easily removed for charging. And the RideControl ONE control lets you adjust settings as you ride.MotorGiant SyncDrive CoreControllerGiant RideControl One ANT+DisplayGiant RideControlOne ANT+BatteryGiant EnergyPak 500Wh, Side-ReleaseSizesS, M, L, XL ,XXLColorsBalsam GreenFrameALUXX aluminum, Overdrive 1½ - 1?" head tube, integrated KS18 kickstand mountForkSR Suntour XCR 32 LO-R Boost 29 100mm travel, Tapered 1½ - 1?" steerer, lockoutShockN/AHandlebarGiant Connect TR Riser 31.8x690~750mmStemGiant ContactSeatpostGiant 30.9mm, 2-bolt Micro Adjustable, Forged AluminiumSaddleGiant SportPedalsAluminum PlatformShiftersShimano DeoreFront Derailleur-Rear DerailleurShimano Deore, 10-Speed, Shadow+BrakesShimano BR-MT200, hydraulic disc, 180mmBrake LeversShimano BL-MT200CassetteShimano HG50-10, 11-42T, 10-SpeedChainKMC e.10 Sport, e-bike optimizedCranksetForged Alloy minimal Q-factor, 36TBottom BracketN/ARimsGiant GX03VHubsGiant eTracker Sport, [F] 15mm Thru-Axle [R] 9mm QR, e-bike optimizedSpokesStainless steelTiresMaxxis Rekon 29x2.4" Wire Bead 60TPIExtrasGiant EnergyPak 4A Fast ChargerWeightThe most accurate way to determine any bike’s weight is to have your local dealer weigh it for you. title: Cycle Science Westville- Bicycle service and repair shop
text:
Cycle Science Westville 
Bicycle Service & Repairs 
1 Link road,  Westville, Durban 

Our workshop situated at the Westville Country Club at the Eco trails opposite Cadence. No 1 Link Road, Westville.

We offer the following services at competitive rates: 

Major Service 
Minor Service 

FREE Bike collection and delivery anywhere in Durban and surrounds 

Additional Services:
• Suspension Service - Quotation depending on work needed
• Wheel Hub Service 
• Wheel truing 
• Gear/Derailleur Calibration 
• All repairs and general maintenance
• Wash and Lube 
• Custom Bike builds
• Full Bicycle restorations
• Replacement parts fitted 

Minor Service:
• Wash n Lube
• Overall diagnostic check
• Front and rear Gears reset
• True Rims
• Check all pivots and moving parts 

Major service - includes Minor service plus:
• Full frame strip down and clean
• Chain & cassette removed & cleaned
• Bottom bracket & headset service
• Derailleurs cleaned & lubed
• Pivot bearings & bushings serviced
• Replace gear cables.

title: Specialized Epic Mountain bike
text:
The bike has been refurbished and is like new. The front and rear suspension/shocks have had major services. The Pivot bearings in the frame, drive train, brakes and wheels have all been rebuild /serviced. I am 1.74m tall/ 80kg and the (medium-large) frame fits me comfortably. Please contact me if you have any other questions. Available for viewing from the   6 December 2021. Price not neg, viewings in Cape Town CBD area. Whatsapp me if interested. 

Technical information:

Frame: Specialized Epic size Large. M5 Aluminium. All Pivot bearing in the frame have been replaced with new high quality Enduro bearings.

Front Suspension: Rockshox SID Dual air fork with 120mm travel. Shock received a major service. It has adjustable compression lockout, a motion control damper with adjustable rebound. I am running 1 Air token with slightly lower air pressure to make it more subtle and improve the forks ramp. 

Shock: Specialized Fox rear shock with brain technology. Adjustable rebound and compression. Fully serviced by Specialized agent.

Drive train: 1x11 SRAM XX1 Eagle shifter and derailleur with new 11-46T Sunrace Cassette and KMC chain.

Wheels: New Sealed bearings. Novatec red anodised hubs with 26" Alex XD LITE rims, and brand new 2.4 Continental Trail King tyres with Tubeless setup. The shimano HG driver that the Casette fits onto has also been serviced.

Dropper post: Brand new Line 6 components contour V2, external dropper post. (Easy to service).

Crank: Shimano Hollowtech 2, 104 BCD with 34T narrow wide chainring and chain guide. Also new shimano BB installed.

Pedals: Crank brothers. (You can run both Flat pedal, or cleats).

Brakes: Shimano XT front and rear. Recently serviced. Brand new pads and disks with 180mm Rotors in front and 160mm in the rear.

Head, bar and stem: 40mm enduro stem with 730mm wide bars and Aaron grips. New sealed head bearings installed.

- Rear mud guard.

title: ***DARRVIN CREST E-BIKE 29R***
text: E+ MTB Hardtail | Urban, Commuting, Touring, MountainSeamless integration upgrade - choose from four configurations.Simple | Sport | City | Touring.OPTIONAL EXTRA: Darrvin Clip on Fender Set, Darrvin Pannier Rack, Darrvin Trunk Bag, Side Stand, Kenda Kwick Journey Commuter Tyre 700x40c.Upgrades include an updated frame geometry with a fully integrated battery, tapered headset, adjustable air suspension fork and wider gear range. Our most versatile model yet.WARRANTY: 1 Year Motor and Battery, 5 Years FrameAVAILABILITY: South Africa (As of August 2021)MODEL YEAR: 2022FEATURESConfidence inspiring MTB frame geometry with 29’’ wheels to smooth the trail.Powerful and responsive Bafang 350W mid motor with ISIS Drive axle for added strength.Front Suspension fork with a remote lock-out.Ultra reliable BAFANG 1 x 9 drive-train with a wide gear range .Aggressive tyres fitted to extra wide rims invite you to get rowdy. With a wider bar and sport orientated components the CREST packs more options than a Swiss army knife. GENERAL NOTES ON RANGE: Predicting range depends on a number of factors: eg. someone who weighs about 70Kg, riding across varied terrain with moderate undulation and a steady cadence of 70-80 rpm can control the range through battery management using the mode settings afforded by the control system. He/She could expect to get anything between 80-120Km from a single battery charge. Visit our FAQ Page for more general Q&A’s.SPECSFRAME: DARRVIN EVO Lite Alloy 29erFRONT FORK: MOZO Mag 29er Air Lock-Out 100mmCHAIN WHEEL: Bafang D-Tech 36T	CHAIN: KMC X9 E Optimised	PEDALS: Wellgo MTB GripHEADSET: D-Tech Sealed Taper Semi IntegratedHANDLEBAR: Promax Comfort Rise 700mmHANDLEBAR STEM: Promax 60/75mm alloy		GRIP/TAPE: Darrvin Trail Touch	BRAKE SET: Darrvin Apex Hydraulic 160mmHUB SET: Darrvin Forged Alloy 32h	RIM: D-Tech Double Wall 29erSPOKE: Stainless Steel black		TIRE: Kenda Slant Six 29 x 2.25	REAR DERAILLEUR: Shimano Altus M2000 SGS 9 Speed	DERAILLEUR LEVER SET R/H: Shimano SLM 2010 Rapid Fire Plus		GEARS: Shimano HG201 11-36T 9 Speed		SADDLE: Darrvin Comfort Sport		SEAT POST: Promax Micro AdjustSEAT CLAMP: D-Tech Quick ReleaseOPTIONAL EXTRA: Darrvin Clip on Fender Set, Darrvin Pannier Rack, Darrvin Trunk Bag, Side Stand, Kenda Kwick Journey Commuter Tyre 700x40c.NOTES ON WEIGHT: A really lightweight mid-range e-bike weighs in at around 21-23Kg, provided its a standard 250watt mid-drive motor model with 300-500Wh battery. A super light carbon MTB e-bike with roughly the same motor and battery might come in at 18-20Kg. For instance a top end R 150 000 ($10 000 USD) Specialized e-bike weighs just over 20Kg. The weight is a consideration if you need to transport the bike on a rack or in the back of your vehicle, but removing the battery might save 4-5Kg already when attempting to lift the bike. Either way, at the moment there is not really a significant difference in weight between most of the available e-bikes in the market. Darrvin’s lightweight aluminum-alloy frame and compact components make for one of the lighter e-bike configurations out there in its price class and with the battery removed is an easy lift onto any bike rack.Mechanical Guarantee: All components will be in a very reasonable to new condition on pre-owned bikes. title: 2021 GIANT STANCE E+2 29ER
text: Steep climbs, technical descents, longer days on the trail. With a smooth suspension setup and a seamless boost of pedaling support, this E-bike gives you the power and technology to ride the trails you dream about.Designed with trail-friendly geometry, Stance E+ helps beginner or intermediate trail riders experience off-road E-bike riding at its best. Its lightweight, strong and stiff ALUXX SL aluminum frame with FlexPoint suspension makes tricky singletrack trails easier to ride. It features 120mm of rear suspension travel and 130mm up front, plus the stable, nimble ride quality of 29-inch wheels. The SyncDrive Sport motor delivers 350 percent tunable support ratios through the Giant E-bike App. The new RideControl ONE with EVO display compatibility has integrated handlebar support buttons for improved ergonomic control. The EnergyPak battery system lets you extend the ride, and now you can charge it up quickly with a newly designed smart charger.MotorGiant SyncDrive SportControllerGiant RideControl One ANT+DisplayWireless display compatibleBatteryGiant EnergyPak Smart 500, 36V Integrated Lithium-IonSizesS, M, L, XLColorsBalsam GreenFrameALUXX SL-grade aluminum, 120mm FlexPoint suspension systemForkSR Suntour XCR 34 Air LO-R, 130mm travel, tapered steerer, Lockout, 110x15 Quick-Loc thru-axleShockRockShox Monarch R, High Volume, 184x44mm, custom tunedHandlebarGiant Connect TR Riser 31.8x780mmStemGiant ContactSeatpostGiant 30.9mm, 2-bolt Micro Adjustable, Forged AluminiumSaddleGiant SportPedalsAluminum PlatformShiftersShimano DeoreFront DerailleurGiant Custom Chain GuideRear DerailleurShimano Deore, 10-Speed, Shadow+BrakesTektro HD-M745 Orion, 4-piston, hydraulic disc, 203mmBrake LeversTektro HD-M745 OrionCassetteShimano CS-M4100-10, 11-46T, 10-SpeedChainKMC e.10 Sport, e-bike optimizedCranksetForged Alloy minimal Q-factor, 36T Steel Direct Mount ring (S:160, M/L:165, XL:170)Bottom BracketN/ARimsGiant XCT 29 Tubeless Ready 25mm e-bike optimizedHubsGiant eTracker Sport, [F] 15mm Thru-Axle [R] 141mm QRSpokesStainless SteelTiresMaxxis Rekon 29x2.4" foldable, 60tpi, EXO, Tubeless ReadyExtrasGiant EnergyPak 6A Smart chargerWeightThe most accurate way to determine any bike’s weight is to have your local dealer weigh it for you. title: Specialized Chisel - 29er - Size Large
text:
** Please read the Full Add

 

Limited Stock in the World of Cycling has brought the
industry to its proverbial knees.

 

Here we have on offer a near spotless example of what a well
looked after hard tail should look like. Almost perfect except for two marks -
one on the crank arm one on the fork.

 

The bike was bought New in November 2020 (Invoice is
available) and the factory fork was replaced with a Rockshox 2020 SID 35 SL
Select Debon Air 100 with Tapered Boost Twistloc at an additional cost of +-
R12 900 (invoice available)

 

The bike is being sold without the pedals and bottle cages
as featured in the photos. This is a rare find, in near perfect condition and a
must see for those wanting to get into the sport.

 

Review below:

 

The all-new Chisel Comp is the perfect bike to begin your
journey into XC riding and racing, with all of the features to get you to that
elusive "top step" at a price that leaves some jingle jangle left
over for race entries.

 

This Chisel comes dressed with Shimano's crisp-shifting SLX
1x12 drivetrain and powerful M6100 hydraulic disc brakes. The Chisel's all-new
frame utilizes our D'Aluisio Smartweld technology that moves the hydroformed
tube joints away from the areas of the highest stress, making the finished
frame's balance of strength, rigidity, and weight more pronounced than any
alloy frame in history. This not only makes the Chisel one of the lightest
alloy hardtail frames coming in as light as 1,400g, but it also allows for
tuned frame stiffness across all sizes.

 

The new Chisel also houses all of the modern features that
you expect from an XC bike, like Progressive XC Geometry with a 68-degree headtube
angle and longer reach, internal cable routing, a threaded bottom bracket,
boost spacing, 30.9mm dropper post compatibility, and 1x-only drivetrains.

 

Price is reflective of condition and cost of the replacement
fork.

 

Selling on behalf of Bother

 

Asking R35 000

title: Giant ATX 2 Medium 27.5er Hard-Tail MTB
text:
I'm selling a Good Condition 27.5er Hard-Tail MTB, Giant ATX 2, frame size (M) suiting rider height 1.73m-1.78m  tall.Bike is a head turner, just get on and ride. The bike is equipped with a tubed wheelset,  RockShox Reba 100mm Shocks, with Lockout. Priced very low @ R5950 for bike only. 
For an additional amount of R500 I can throw in the ffg accesories; MTB Cleat Pedals, Speedometer saddlebag with spare tube, Front and back LED Lights, and an MTB Helmet. Nothing other than your size MTB Shoes will be needed to start off in the sport of trail riding. 
Located in Musgrave 
Durban
082-478-6163 

Factory Description - Giant ATX 2 27.5" Mountainbike 
Solid twenty seven.five -MTB! 
The 650b edition is a mountain hardtail that is designed to be light, efficient and reasonably priced. Featuring RockShox Reba  preloaded shock fork 100mm travel, with lockout, Hydraulic disc brakes, and cable routing this is the perfect bike for the novice or budget conscious mountain biker. 

The bike is equipped with a quality 1x10-speed Shimano XT drivetrain,  Hydrolic Deore LX braking system. 

27.5er Wheels - Improved roll-over is the most noticeable attribute when it comes to MTB wheels. The big wheels are great for rolling over nasty roots and rocky sections, essentially making it easier to ride these conditions. Improved traction is also a key factor with the increased wheel diameter compared to 26" wheels as tire contact to the ground is larger. 

- best roll-over performance 
- carries momentum 
- maximum traction surface 
- best stability on easy trails 
- lowest suspension stress 
- great for larger rider sizes 
- increase stability on long curve

title: Ryder Bora 2.0 UK9 + MTB Shimano Pedals + Cleates
text:
Retails for R1800 at Cyclelab. You can get it for half price with a free set of used MTB Pedals.

The Ryder Bora 2.0 MTB Cycling Shoe offers the comfort and quick adjustment provided by a A-Top dial. With a single dial and a set-and-forget front strap, it should be convenient for the rider to be able to slip on this shoe and hit the trails. The A-top dial offers 1mm adjustment increments when tightening with macro release function. The co-moulded nylon and rubber lugged outsole provides high traction and durability to this shoe, ensuring that it will be suitable for varying terrains.

Features:

- Rigid MTB sole to protect the rider and increase power transfer from the rider to the pedals
- A-top fastening system for an adjustable, custom fit
- Breathable mesh to keep the rider cool
- Rubber non-slip heel lining to increase the stability of the rider

BASED IN FLORIDA NORTH.

title: Rent an electric Mountain Bike- Hout Bay, Constantia, Camps Bay
text:
Electric Mountain Biking with Cape Lion e-Rides offers the most e-xciting way to get around mountain biking trails this summer - e-MTB! If you are new to e-biking, it's like cycling, but without the grind. 
E-MTBs offer a little more push uphills and little more fun on the downhills. If you haven't tried it yet, what are you waiting for?
Discover the trails of Constantia, Silvermine, Table Mountain National Park and more.  
OUR E-MTBsHard Tail or Full Suspension available

Maximum rider weight, 150 Kg

Minimum age, 14 years old



RENTAL PRICESStarting from R450
WE DELIVER!Hout Bay & surrounds including Camps Bay, CBD, Constantia, Bishopscourt, Newlands and Noordhoek e-bike delivery is FREE. (Noordhoek delivery free, but toll gate charges apply).
MORE INFO?WhatsApp your questions to Christoph at +27 (0)764 559 428
